content.body: ALKO and License No 1 are throwing a party to celebrate the launch of ALKO. A Drink-up will be going on the whole time, so you"ll be able to get your 2 for 1 ALKO special anytime that night.

content.header: Wish I could get 2 free drinks…
content.body: You know what? Me too. And License No 1 is making it happen. On Thursday, you"ll be able to unlock the 2 for 1 special twice.
ALKO and Bohemian Biergarten are throwing a party to celebrate the launch of ALKO. A Drink-up will be going on the whole time, so you"ll be able to get your 2 for 1 ALKO special anytime that night.
